E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 4/30/1986
Subject: Don Bedford healing process
Don Bedford is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Status of Cordell Montoya
Dear Sir,
Cordell Montoya has an AVG of .200 at AA Scituate Somersets!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Status of Kenneth Stonebraker
Dear Sir,
Kenneth Stonebraker has problems at AA Scituate Somersets!
He has an ERA of 5.14, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director
